AT.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
AT.description: Ausgehungerte Felsmonster überfallen Dörfer und machen sich über das Vieh her. Es gibt nur ein Gürteltier, das zäh genug ist, sie aufzuhalten: Ranger Dillon! Verteidige Dörfer gegen Wellen von Kreaturen, indem du Geschütztürme und Beobachtungsposten baust. Stürze dich in den Kampf gegen die bösartigen Monster und setze unter anderem Dillons fantastische Roll- und Wirbelattacken sowie seine scharfen Klauen ein. Sammele Erz aus Minen, um Verteidigungstore für das Dorf zu bauen und plündere verborgene Schätze in uralten Ruinen. Mit Dillon’s Rolling Western erlebst du ein Tower Defence-Spiel wie nie zuvor!

AU.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
AU.description: Ravenous rock monsters are raiding villages to feast on their livestock, and there's only one armadillo tough enough to stop them: ranger Dillon! Defend villages against waves of creatures - building gun towers and lookouts - and battle the varmints with Dillon's sharp claws, awesome Roll Attack, Grind Attack and more. Gather ore from mines to make defence gates for the village, and raid ancient ruins for hidden treasure, too. Dillon’s Rolling Western puts a new spin on the tower defence genre!

BG.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
BG.description: Ravenous rock monsters are raiding villages to feast on their livestock, and there's only one armadillo tough enough to stop them: ranger Dillon! Defend villages against waves of creatures - building gun towers and lookouts - and battle the varmints with Dillon's sharp claws, awesome Roll Attack, Grind Attack and more. Gather ore from mines to make defence gates for the village, and raid ancient ruins for hidden treasure, too. Dillon’s Rolling Western puts a new spin on the tower defence genre!

BE.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
BE.description: Des monstres de pierre affamés s'attaquent au bétail des villages de la région, et seul un tatou est assez téméraire pour les arrêter : Dillon, le ranger ! Construisez des tours défensives pour protéger les ranchs, et affrontez ces hordes voraces avec vos griffes acérées et vos attaques spéciales de tatou de combat ! Pour mener à bien votre vendetta, vous pouvez exploiter les gisements de minerai pour fabriquer des portes défensives, et rechercher les trésors cachés dans des ruines millénaires. Dillon’s Rolling Western révolutionne le genre tower defence !

ES.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
ES.description: Un grupo de voraces monstruos pétreos está saqueando los pueblos de los alrededores para robar el ganado de los aldeanos, ¡y Dillon es el único armadillo que tiene lo que hace falta para detenerlos! Construye torres de defensa y observación para proteger los poblados de las criaturas que los atacan y utiliza las afiladas garras de Dillon y sus ataques especiales Atropellar y Rallar para acabar con los enemigos que encuentres. Recoge materiales en las minas para reforzar los poblados con puertas defensivas y explora antiguas ruinas en busca de tesoros ocultos. ¡Descubre un juego de defensa de la torre completamente distinto con Dillon's Rolling Western!

IT.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
IT.description: Mostri di pietra affamati stanno prendendo d'assalto i villaggi per cibarsi del bestiame. Solo un eroe può impedire che questo accada: Dillon il cowboy! Difendi i villaggi dalle orde nemiche costruendo torrette di difesa e postazioni di avvistamento, e combattendo i farabutti con le grinfie affilate di Dillon, con i fantastici attacchi (rotante e frantumatutto) e altro ancora. Usa i minerali delle miniere per costruire le porte difensive del villaggio ed esplora le antiche rovine per scovare tesori nascosti! Dillon's Rolling Western è un gioco che rivoluziona il genere Tower Defence!

NL.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
NL.description: Roofzuchtige stenen monsters overvallen dorpen om zich goed te doen aan hun vee, maar er is één gordeldier sterk genoeg om ze te stoppen: ranger Dillon! Verdedig dorpen tegen de aanvalsgolven van deze wezens. Bouw verdedigingstorens en uitkijkposten en ga de strijd aan tegen het ongedierte met Dillons scherpe klauwen en zijn geweldige speciale aanvallen. Verzamel erts uit de mijnen en gebruik ze voor het opzetten van de verdedigingspoorten voor het dorp en kam ook de oude ruïnes uit voor verborgen schatten. Dillon's Rolling West geeft een nieuwe draai aan de torenverdedigingsgenre!

NZ.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
NZ.description: Ravenous rock monsters are raiding villages to feast on their livestock, and there's only one armadillo tough enough to stop them: ranger Dillon! Defend villages against waves of creatures - building gun towers and lookouts - and battle the varmints with Dillon's sharp claws, awesome Roll Attack, Grind Attack and more. Gather ore from mines to make defence gates for the village, and raid ancient ruins for hidden treasure, too. Dillon’s Rolling Western puts a new spin on the tower defence genre!

PL.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
PL.description: Ravenous rock monsters are raiding villages to feast on their livestock, and there's only one armadillo tough enough to stop them: ranger Dillon! Defend villages against waves of creatures - building gun towers and lookouts - and battle the varmints with Dillon's sharp claws, awesome Roll Attack, Grind Attack and more. Gather ore from mines to make defence gates for the village, and raid ancient ruins for hidden treasure, too. Dillon’s Rolling Western puts a new spin on the tower defence genre!

PT.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
PT.description: Vorazes monstros de pedra estão a pilhar povoações para devorar o seu gado e há apenas um armadilho suficientemente duro para os deter: o cowboy Dillon! Defende as povoações de ataques de várias criaturas - construindo torres de defesa e postos de vigia - e combate as pragas com as garras afiadas do Dillon, ou utilizando o fantástico Roll Attack, Grind Attack e muito mais! Recolhe metal das minas para construir portões de defesa para a povoação e explora também antigas ruínas para encontrar tesouros escondidos. Dillon's Rolling Western revoluciona o género Tower Defence!

RU.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
RU.description: Орды голодных чудовищ нападают на поселения, разоряя скотные дворы. Остановить их может только герой-одиночка – броненосец Dillon. Чтобы защитить мирных жителей от вражеского нашествия, вы можете строить оборонительные и смотровые башни – но не забудьте, что Dillon и сам не робкого десятка. У него острые когти и целый арсенал боевых приемов: например, он может накатиться на врага или растоптать его в лепешку! Вы можете добывать руду в шахтах и использовать ее для строительства оборонительных заграждений. А в заброшенных руинах вас ждут тайники с сокровищами – нужно только суметь их отыскать! Игра Dillon’s Rolling Western представляет новый, оригинальный подход к жанру Tower Defence.

SE.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™
SE.description: Ravenous rock monsters are raiding villages to feast on their livestock, and there's only one armadillo tough enough to stop them: ranger Dillon!
